Name.label: Primary interstitial lung disease in childhood and adulthood

TextSection.Contents: Idiopathic pulmonary hemosiderosis is a respiratory disease due to repeated episodes of diffuse alveolar hemorrhage without any underlying apparent cause, most often in children. Anemia, cough, and pulmonary infiltrates on chest radiographs are found in majority of the patients.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))
BTNT (broader term maps to a narrower term)
